sql_query: SELECT b.NAME AS team_name,
CASE WHEN b.NAME = '王学东团队' THEN '王学东'
WHEN b.NAME = '范一平团队' THEN '范一平'
WHEN b.NAME = '马丁团队' THEN '马丁'
WHEN b.NAME = '杨小军团队' THEN '杨小军'
WHEN b.NAME = '商务团队' THEN '张玉凤'
WHEN b.NAME = '张伟团队' THEN '张伟'
WHEN b.NAME = '张利民团队' THEN '张利民'
WHEN b.NAME = '省外陈志平团队' THEN '陈志平'
WHEN b.NAME = '省外团队' THEN '王垒峰'
WHEN b.NAME = '宋志伟团队' THEN '宋志伟'
WHEN b.NAME = '省外李会兵团队' THEN '李会兵'
WHEN b.NAME = '永骋市场部' THEN '和葆华'
WHEN b.NAME = '信访销售组' THEN '李龙'
ELSE '' END AS team_leader,
a.NAME AS member_name
FROM org_member a
JOIN org_unit b ON a.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID = b.ID
WHERE (b.NAME LIKE '%团队%' OR b.NAME LIKE '%销售%' OR b.NAME LIKE '%市场%')
AND a.STATE = 1
AND a.IS_ENABLE = 1
AND b.NAME <> '商务团队'
UNION ALL
SELECT '信访销售组' AS team_name, '李龙' AS team_leader, '李龙' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '省外团队' AS team_name, '王磊峰' AS team_leader, '王垒峰' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '永骋市场部' AS team_name, '和葆华' AS team_leader, '和葆华' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '杨小军团队' AS team_name, '杨小军' AS team_leader, '陈志玮' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '省外团队' AS team_name, '王垒峰' AS team_leader, '李刚' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '政务实施部' AS team_name, '李渊' AS team_leader, '李渊' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '研发二部' AS team_name, '韩鑫磊' AS team_leader, '韩鑫磊' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '省外团队' AS team_name, '王垒峰' AS team_leader, '李哲' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '技术中心' AS team_name, '张煇' AS team_leader, '马小娴' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '王学东团队' AS team_name, '王学东' AS team_leader, '苏素芳' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '经营管理委员会' AS team_name, '赵宝金' AS team_leader, '赵宝金' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '技术中心' AS team_name, '张煇' AS team_leader, '张煇' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '研发五部' AS team_name, '冯向阳' AS team_leader, '霍春玲' AS member_name
UNION ALL
SELECT '王学东团队' AS team_name, '王学东' AS team_leader, '马振业' AS member_name
